snippet.title: Badlands Crew - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the Badlands and experience dynamic combat in a large world, skill progression, in-depth crew management, customisation, and more! 

Badlands Crew launches April 28th 2025! 

Demo available to play now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3402770/Badlands_Crew_Demo/

For all things Badlands Crew, follow us on:

X: https://bit.ly/3ph3LHb
Discord: https://bit.ly/3CTkOC0
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/thecrewgames.bsky.social
